Ext.panel.Panel Example

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.0.7 Ext.panel.Panel Ext.Panel panel
[example]
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.panel.Panel', {
        title: 'Hello',
        width: 200,
        html: '
World!
',
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
